title.vi: TOP 10 Eyelash Extension Supply Stores in Thu Duc & District 2 (2025)
title.en: TOP 10 Eyelash Extension Supply Stores in Thu Duc & District 2 (2025)

excerpt.vi: Looking for quality lash supplies in Thu Duc City? Discover the top 10 providers, led by Nanky Beauty (Old District 2), specializing in premium imported materials.
excerpt.en: Looking for quality lash supplies in Thu Duc City? Discover the top 10 providers, led by Nanky Beauty (Old District 2), specializing in premium imported materials.

content.vi:
Are you looking for a reputable address to buy quality lash tools in Thu Duc City (Old District 2)? We have compiled the Top 10 lash tool suppliers near you. These places provide a full range of lash tools from basic to specialized, meeting all your needs.

1. Nanky Beauty – Premium Lash Material Provider (District 2/Thao Dien)

Address: 71 Vanh Dai Tay, An Khanh Ward, Thu Duc City (Thao Dien Area)

Supply Hotline: 0852.759.678

Opening Hours: 08:00 – 21:00 (Daily)

Rating: 5.0 ⭐ - The best source for high-end lash supplies in Thao Dien.

Topping the list in Thu Duc City (Old District 2), Nanky Beauty is not only an international class lash salon but also a leading distributor of high-end lash materials. This is a reliable address for professional technicians who want to upgrade their services with the best quality products.

Nanky Beauty specializes in providing 100% imported products from Korea, USA, UK (BL Lash glue, Sky Glue, Lash Box LA lashes, London Lash Pro). Focusing on quality, safety, and ultra-light lash materials (Exclusive Feather Lashes, Rabbit Lashes), Nanky Beauty ensures the most premium supply of lash materials in the Thao Dien area.

2. Hana Beautys

Address: 143 Tan Huong, Tan Quy, Tan Phu, Ho Chi Minh.

Hotline: 0705 612 647

Hana Beautys is a trusted address for those looking for quality lash tools in HCMC. Diverse products, professional service, and affordable prices.

3. Xie Lash Tools

Address: 13/1A Quang Trung, Ward 8, Go Vap, Ho Chi Minh.

Hotline: 0931 171 708

Xie in HCMC has become one of the leading lash tool suppliers, trusted by many spas and lash experts. Xie stands out with competitive prices.

4. Thanh Tu Eyelash

Address: 159/17 Bach Dang, Ward 2, Tan Binh, Ho Chi Minh.

Hotline: 0903 634 825

Thanh Tu Eyelash stands out as an ideal destination for beauty professionals. The shop offers a wide range of high-quality lash tools.

5. Ho Ngoc Loi Shop

Address: 493A6 Cach Mang Thang 8, Ward 13, District 10, Ho Chi Minh.

Hotline: 0902 676 194

Ho Ngoc Loi has built a solid reputation in the beauty industry, trusted by many spas and lash centers.

6. Vinh Nguyen Lash

Address: 233/6 Hau Giang, Ward 5, District 6, Ho Chi Minh.

Hotline: 0946 124 252

Vinh Nguyen is an address not to be missed for experts. This place stands out with a reputation for reasonable prices.

7. Sunway Beauty (Tan Phu)

Address: 50/42 Duc Hien, Tay Thanh, Tan Phu, Ho Chi Minh

Hotline: 0914 004 112

Sunway Beauty provides reputable, quality lash tools in HCMC with competitive prices.

8. Thien Trang Nail Lash Accessories

Address: 191 Nguyen Van Nghi, Ward 7, Go Vap, Ho Chi Minh.

Hotline: 0916 796 274

Thien Trang provides a variety of lash types imported directly from Thailand and Korea.

9. Nail – Lash Accessories District 6

Address: 1022 Hau Giang, Ward 12, District 6, Ho Chi Minh

Hotline: 0888 168 566

The lash tools of Nail-Mi District 6 are produced from high-quality materials, ensuring durability.

10. Ngoc Bich Nail Lash Accessories Shop

Address: 306 Le Duc Tho, Ward 6, Go Vap, Ho Chi Minh.

Hotline: 0978 855 986

Ngoc Bich – a place providing cheap, quality lash tools for beginners.

Choosing a reputable supplier for lash tools in Thu Duc City is extremely important. For guaranteed quality and premium products right in District 2, Nanky Beauty is the top recommendation.
